text:
BOSTON UNIVERSITY
School of Public Relations and Communications
84 Exeter Street â€¢ Boston 16 Massachusetts
lie feel that your membership to the AERT Journal has been
carried on our overdue list far too long. The new administration
of AERT has asked me to eliminate those memberships which are
not currently in good standing.
Unless we hear from you within the next 30 days your name
will be dropped from our membership rolls. We hope that you
will renew within that time in order to keep your membership
in good standing.
Sincerely*
(Hiss) Vce Kounas
Membership Secretary
Association for Education by Radio-TV
